Package org.openlca.core.matrix

Interface MatrixIndex<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Copyable<MatrixIndex<T>>, Iterable<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FlowIndex, ImpactIndex, TechIndex
public interface MatrixIndex<T> extends Copyable<MatrixIndex<T>>, Iterable<T>
Maps a set of instances of a given type to the corresponding rows or columns of a matrix.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • add

      int add​(T elem)
      Adds the given element to this index and returns the position of that element in this index. If this index already contains this element only the existing position is return without modifying this index.

    • addAll

      default void addAll​(Iterable<T> elements)
      Adds all element of the given collection to this index.

    • addAll

      default <I extends MatrixIndex<T>> void addAll​(I other)
      Adds all element of the given index to this index.

    • at

      T at​(int i)
      Get the index element at the given matrix position.

    • contains

      default boolean contains​(T elem)
      Returns true if this index contains the given element.

    • content

      Set<T> content()
      Get the content of this index.

    • each

      void each​(IndexConsumer<T> fn)
      Iterates over this index calling the given function for each position and element pair.

    • isEmpty

      default boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true when this index is empty and does not contain any element.

    • of

      int of​(T elem)
      Get the matrix position of the given index element. Returns -1 if the given element is not part of this index.

    • size

      int size()
      Returns the number of elements of this index.
